# m-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description               | Type      | Default  |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------- | --------- | -------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Flag to disable the input | `boolean` | `false`  |
| `label`       | `label`       | The label text            | `string`  | `''`     |
| `modId`       | `mod-id`      | The id of the input       | `string`  | `''`     |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | The placeholder text      | `string`  | `''`     |
| `type`        | `type`        | The type of the input     | `string`  | `'text'` |
| `value`       | `value`       | The value of the input    | `string`  | `''`     |


## Events

| Event       | Description                              | Type                  |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `modChange` | Emitted when the input value has changed | `CustomEvent<string>` |
